promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young strong dragon water-type pokemon wearing white bracers. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquatigon, a a young strong dragon water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Hydro Crunch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "water" or "Aquatigon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, dragon-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Living amidst the glistening rivers, this unique fauna exhibits its strength through Hydro Crunch. Known for its aquatic prowess, it personifies vitality.
